locations.title: Steamer Lane
locations.description: Santa Cruz is home to some of the most iconic California waves. On the west side of town lies Steamer Lane, one of the most consistent waves in town. Home to a devoted local crew along with whatever gets washed down the San Lorenzo river, Steamer Lane is fun at just about any size. When small, it offers rippable rights along the cliff. The lane can hold just about any size, with the first reef of Middle Peak maxing out at just about 12 feet on the wave face. Best at low tide.
